DELETE /railguns/{identifier}.description: Disable and delete a Railgun. This will immediately disable that Railgun for any connected zones.

GET /railguns.description: List, search, sort and filter your Railguns.

schema.description: Sort Railguns in ascending or descending order.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

build.description: The build identifier for the Railgun receiver.

enabled.description: Flag to determine if the Railgun is accepting connections.

modified_on.description: When the Railgun was last modified.

revision.description: The revision of the Railgun receiver.

upgrade_info.description: Defined when the Railgun version is out of date from the latest release from Cloudflare.

download_link.description: An HTTP link to download the latest Railgun binary.

latest_version.description: Latest version of the Railgun receiver available to install.

version.description: The version of the Railgun receiver.

zones_connected.description: The number of zones using this Railgun.

The last time proof of ownership was detected and the zone was made
active

development_mode.description:
The interval (in seconds) from when development mode expires
(positive integer) or last expired (negative integer) for the
domain. If development mode has never been enabled, this value is 0.

modified_on.description: When the zone was last modified

original_dnshost.description: DNS host at the time of switching to Cloudflare

original_name_servers.description:
Original name servers before moving to Cloudflare
Notes: Is this only available for full zones?

original_registrar.description: Registrar for the domain at the time of switching to Cloudflare
